languages.text: "Вот мы и свиделись вновь, Ульфар Громогласный". {n}Торбальд сурово кивает Ульфару, затем переводит строгий взгляд на вас.{/n} "Живи долго, Вольный Торговец. Дело привело нас на твою ладью".
"So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."
languages.original_text: "Вот мы и свиделись вновь, Ульфар Громогласный". {n}Торбальд сурово кивает Ульфару, затем переводит строгий взгляд на вас.{/n} "Живи долго, Вольный Торговец. Дело привело нас на твою ладью".

traits.locale_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

traits.locale_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: «Volvemos a vernos, Ulfar Pulmón Atronador». {n}Thorbald asiente severamente en dirección a Ulfar y se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Larga vida, Comerciante Independiente. Venimos a su drekkar por un asunto importante».
languages.original_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."

traits.locale_text: «Volvemos a vernos, Ulfar Pulmón Atronador». {n}Thorbald asiente severamente en dirección a Ulfar y se gira hacia ti.{/n} «Larga vida, Comerciante Independiente. Venimos a su drekkar por un asunto importante».
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: “我们又见面了，‘雷狼’乌尔法。”{n}索巴德朝乌尔法严厉地点了点头，然后将坚定的目光投向你，{/n}“长命百岁，行商浪人。我们来到你的撞角长船，是有要事要做。”
languages.original_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."

traits.locale_text: “我们又见面了，‘雷狼’乌尔法。”{n}索巴德朝乌尔法严厉地点了点头，然后将坚定的目光投向你，{/n}“长命百岁，行商浪人。我们来到你的撞角长船，是有要事要做。”
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: 「また会ったな、ウルファー・サンダーラング」{n}トールバルドはウルファーに向かって力強くうなずき、鋼のような視線をあなたに向ける。{/n}「栄光あれ、自由開拓者よ。ビジネスが俺たちをお前のドレッカールまで連れてきてくれた」
languages.original_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."

traits.locale_text: 「また会ったな、ウルファー・サンダーラング」{n}トールバルドはウルファーに向かって力強くうなずき、鋼のような視線をあなたに向ける。{/n}「栄光あれ、自由開拓者よ。ビジネスが俺たちをお前のドレッカールまで連れてきてくれた」
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: « Comme on se retrouve, Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre. » {n}Thorbald incline sèchement la tête à l'attention d'Ulfar avant de vous adresser un regard d'acier.{/n} « Longue vie à vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous sommes ici pour affaires. »
languages.original_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."

traits.locale_text: « Comme on se retrouve, Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre. » {n}Thorbald incline sèchement la tête à l'attention d'Ulfar avant de vous adresser un regard d'acier.{/n} « Longue vie à vous, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Nous sommes ici pour affaires. »
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "So begegnen wir uns wieder, Ulfar Donnerlunge." {n}Thorbald nickt Ulfar streng zu und richtet seinen stählernen Blick dann auf dich.{/n} "Lebt lang, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Geschäftliches führt uns zu Eurem Drekkar."
languages.original_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."

traits.locale_text: "So begegnen wir uns wieder, Ulfar Donnerlunge." {n}Thorbald nickt Ulfar streng zu und richtet seinen stählernen Blick dann auf dich.{/n} "Lebt lang, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Geschäftliches führt uns zu Eurem Drekkar."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil

languages.text: "Yeniden karşılaştık Ulfar Tufanciğer." {n}Ulfar'a sertçe başını eğen Thorbald, ardından haşin bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Çok yaşa Hür Tacir. Yolumuz drekkarına düştü."
languages.original_text: "So we meet again, Ulfar Thunderlung." {n}Thorbald gives Ulfar a stern nod, then turns his steely gaze on you.{/n} "Live long, Rogue Trader. Business has brought us to your drekkar."

traits.locale_text: "Yeniden karşılaştık, Ulfar Tufanciğer." {n}Thorbald, Ulfar'a sertçe başını eğiyor ve haşin bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Çok yaşa Hür Tacir. Yolumuz drekkarına düştü."
traits.speaker: Torbald_WarCouncil
